mapper.select: select * from music where name like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or album like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or singer like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into music (name, album, singer, startTime, endTime) values (#{name}, #{album}, #{singer}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
